      Returns:

    • addMovieList

      public static boolean addMovieList​(java.util.List<Movie> mList, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String synopsis, java.lang.String director, java.lang.String cast, java.lang.String genre, java.time.Duration time, MovieStatus status, int sale, double rating)
      this function is to allow staff to add new movie into movie csv and movie objects
      Parameters:
      mList - A list of movie objects
      name - Movie name
      synopsis - Movie Synopsis
      director - Movie Director
      cast - Movie cast
      genre - Movie genre
      time - Movie duration
      status - Movie status
      sale - Movie sales
      rating - Movie Rating
      Returns:
      It will return true if movies is updated into csv successfully
